english.verse1: Your steadfast love extends to the heavens. Your faithfulness reaches to the clouds. Your righteousness is like majestic mountains. And your wisdom like the depths of the sea. And you come to me.
english.verse2: Filling my heart with your loving kindness. I find my peace in the shadow of your wings. I eat my fill from the abundance of your household. And I drink from the streams of rejoicing.
english.verse3: You are my king. You are my king. You are my king. You are my king.
